items.name: 01 - Auto Slacker
items.lore:
Automatically does... nothing ?
 +0.1 slack per second

items.name: 03 - Convert Colleague
items.lore:
<< Come on, try it man ! I promise it's fun and totally not addictive >> - John SLACK, fired the next day.
 +1 slack per second

items.name: 04 - Slack Boost I
items.lore:
Doing something makes you do nothing... faster ? Whoever designed this game is probably a Steve main..
 Manually slacking accelerates production

items.name: 05 - Powerful Slacking I
items.lore:
Did you know Japan hosted a Do Nothing Competition ? .
 Makes Auto Slackers 200% more powerful.

items.name: 06 - Masterful Slacking I
items.lore:
Title given by You, to Yourself. Be proud™
 +50% production to all colleagues.

items.name: 07 - Slackonomics
items.requirements: Requires Masterful Slacking and Powerful Slacking
items.lore:
You convinced HR that slacking increases morale and productivity. Somehow, they bought it.
 x1.5 to ALL passive slack generation

items.name: 08 - The Slackverse
items.lore:
<< - How many did you see ?
 - 14 000 605
 - How many we work ?
 - 0. >> - That one colleague that sends memes at work
 +7 to slack per second.

items.name: 09 - Microslack Powerpoint
items.lore:
Preparing a slide so I can slack in meetings, too.
 1.5x to production power while using Microsoft Powerpoint. 1.1x to overall multiplier

items.name: 10 - Microslack Excel
items.lore:
Slacking in word looks awfully like Dave from accounting is doing...
 1.5x to production power while using Microsoft Excel. 1.1x to overall multiplier

items.name: 11 - Microslack OneNote
items.lore:
Wait, why bring the obscure microsoft apps only ?
 1.5x to production power while using Microsoft OneNote. 1.1x to overall multiplier

items.name: 12 - Microslack InfoPath
items.lore:
Game's dev here : I don't really expect you to use this one.
 I don't even have it installed and have no idea what it is.

 4x to production power if you manage to get it working. 1.1x to overall multiplier

items.name: 13 - Microslack SharePoint
items.lore:
Okay let's be real I have no idea what that is.
 This one actually doesn't give anything but you need it to unlock stuff. 1.1x to overall multiplier

items.name: 14 - Microslack Infinity Gauntlet
items.lore:
Using the Microslack upgrades and putting the referenced programs' icons in the right order, it produces a funny word.
 If that made you laugh, you owe me a steam review.
 Gives +2 to slack per second per Auto Slacker, Converted Colleague, or Slackverse.

items.name: 15 - Slacking Paradox
items.lore:
This is becoming a full time job
 +50 to slack per second.

items.name: 16 - Compound Disinterest
items.lore:
Retire your children early by being lazy
 Multiplies all slacking by 25% of the power of Auto Slackers

items.name: 02 - Coffee Break
items.lore:
No amount of caffeine could give me enough energy to get stuff done
 Manual Slacking and Auto Slackers are twice as powerful.

items.name: 17 - Slacker Consultant
items.lore:
Ha, I wrote consultant twice !
 +180 slack per second. Each Consultant increases the efficiency of all other previous slackers by 1%.

items.name: 18 - John Slack
items.lore:
Oh my god it's John Slack from Fortnite !!1!1!§§
 Pressing scroll lock boosts slacking by 50% for 30 seconds (5 minutes cooldown)

items.name: 19 - I wouldn't touch that if I were you
items.lore:
The upgrade costs 69420 and says not to buy it, I would listen if I were you.
 I'm not telling.

items.name: 20 - MAKE IT STOP
items.requirements: Requires buying the previous upgrade that I told you not to buy
items.lore:
Turns out it made the soundbar into a slack loading bar
 Made it stop (you can still activate it manually in config.json for the funnies)

items.name: 21 - Email bot
items.lore: One email a day keeps the boss away.
items.requirements: Is not in the game yet

items.name: 22 - Coffee Overdose
items.lore: Welp, that's one way to avoid work.
items.requirements: Is not in the game yet

items.name: 23 - PRO-crastinator
items.lore: Casual crastinators when PRO-crastinator walks in
items.requirements: Is not in the game yet

items.name: 24 - Efort
items.lore: Effort ? No, Efort, your unemployed 26 y/o brother.
items.requirements: Is not in the game yet

items.name: 25 - Questionable Music Taste
items.lore: Make your coworkers avoid you by blasting 2014 Emo music MAX VOLUME in your office.
items.requirements: Is not in the game yet

items.name: 26 - The Your-Boss-Gets-Smaller-As-He-Approaches-You upgrade
items.lore: Is that a JoJo reference ?
items.requirements: Is not in the game yet

items.name: 03.5 - <<Yo you should come with me !>>
items.lore:
I guess we bringing colleagues now
 Converted colleagues are twice as efficient.

items.name: 08.5 - One More Universe
items.lore:
print(universe++);
 Slackverses are twice as efficient.

items.name: 15.5 - We need more philosophers !!
items.lore:
So... much... paradoxes...... must... get... more... brainpower...
 Slack Paradoxes are twice as efficient.

items.name: 17.5 - Sudden Wisdom
items.lore:
Divine Intervention seems to have given consultants << common sense >>.
 Consultants are twice as efficient.

items.name: 21.5 - Overclocking
items.lore:
The email bot went too fast. Your PC burst into flames. It triggered the fire alarm. No more work today. Mission success - Respect+
 Email bots are twice as efficient.

items.name: 22.5 - Existential Crisis
items.lore:
This near death made you realise life is too short to be spent working.
 Coffee Overdoses are twice as efficient.

items.name: 23.5 - Upset Factor of TEN
items.lore:
BREAKING NEWS : CASUAL-CRASTINATOR BEATS PRO-CRASTINATOR IN GRAND FINALS
 PRO-crastinators are twice as efficient

items.name: 24.5 - Unemployement
items.lore:
Efort is kind of like the tall brother in Les Tuches
 Eforts are twice as efficient, somehow.

items.name: 25.5 - Grow Up
items.lore:
It's not 2014 Highschool anymore, I'm sorry (joke aside, listen to whatever you love)
 Questionable Music Tastes are twice as efficient.

items.name: 26.5 - Your Next line Is
items.lore:
Is that a JoJo reference ?????
 The upgrade-with-a-lot-of-unions-you-know-which-ones are twice as efficient.
